title: Account Hacked and Cheated on, resulted in a unjust perma ban on my account.
body:
Dear concerned team, 

I'm an honest league of legends player that has been playing for almost 6 years now. Not once have I used any third party stuff because I have spent so much money on my account. Tonight I just tried to log into it and it said It has been banned for using third party stuff? I last played League of legends 9 days ago in an aram so I was shocked to see this.

I read the forums and people said to check your match history on oce.op.gg which I just did and what do I see? To my suprise someone has just played four ranked games in the past 4 hours. I don't even get home till 7:00pm because I work full time so this is definitely not me and I'm very scared as to how someone was able to log into my account. 

I have never shared my password with anyone nor have I used any third party stuff as again I repeat I'm an honest player that has spent a lot on my account and I'm really upset that this has happened to my account. I have immediately changed my password using my registered email and I sincerely request you to please look into this for me as this has me really worried. 

Thank you, Edolyn.

replies.body:
1. Change the password for the associated email address, and any other accounts that share those passwords as well.
2. Run an anti-virus scan on your computer.
3. Submit an account recovery ticket to player support: https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new (Select the "I need to Recover an Account" option).

Once the account is secure and ownership is verified support can generally restore the account. There are some exceptions to that, but usually when a ban is issued for actions taken under compromise, that account can be fully restored.

Hi Ninox,

Thanks for your reply. 

Please note I have done the 3 steps as mentioned above however I accidentally submitted the ticket under the wrong option instead of "I need to Recover an Account"

Should I resubmit a new ticket or just wait for the existing one to be re-directed?

Thanks.

Account Recovery tickets are rather unique, and you have to be logged out to submit them. If you submitted a regular ticket they will direct you to open an account recovery one anyway, so you may as well do that now and skip the wait.
Noted - thanks Ninox. Please note my account is now unbanned so thanks for the help.

Say goodbye to it.
Even if you supply evidence that it was hacked, Riot won't care.

Support has successfully unbanned my account.

Thank you Riot Games <3

That must be nice. 
We still fighting to get another one back.
